about_the_game:
Embark on an epic narrative RPG journey filled with enigmatic mysteries, morally complex choices, compelling original characters, and rich sci-fi lore. As you ascend the ranks from a lowly slave to a mighty Captain, you will traverse from the pinnacle of a once-glorious empire to the shadowy depths of the notorious pirate mothership known as the Calamity.

Navigate this dangerous and thrilling adventure as you grapple with the tantalizing opportunity to claim captaincy or succumb to the doomed fate that awaits the ship's occupants. Will you rise above the challenges, outsmart your rivals, and seize your rightful place among the stars, or will you be swallowed by the darkness that surrounds you? The choice is yours to make as you carve out your own destiny in this gripping sci-fi odyssey.

From Le Havre Creation, a newly established studio from Quebec city. Becoming Captain is a new twist on the classic-styled RPG, using both original stories and an innovative take on card based combat in order to craft an adventure shaped by your hands. Do you have what it takes to become captain?

Main Features:   




Immerse yourself in a treacherous web of treason and conspiracy, where every ally could be a potential enemy and every foe lurks in the shadows, plotting your downfall. Navigate this intricate political landscape by skillfully discerning who is worthy of trust and who is merely biding their time to betray you. Craft alliances with cunning diplomacy, uncover potential traitors within your midst, and strategically strike down your adversaries to solidify your power and influence. Transform your ragtag crew into a formidable force as you rise through the ranks and shape the fate of the empire. Will you emerge victorious, or succumb to the machinations of your enemies? The future lies in your hands!



Once groomed as a captain of the mighty Terran empire, your destiny was abruptly altered by the devastating Calamity, which stripped you of everything. Faced with the cruel grip of enslavement, will you succumb to despair and relinquish your dreams, or will you defy the odds, reclaim your rightful place as Captain, and forge a new path to greatness? The choice is yours to make as you navigate through challenges and adversity in your quest for redemption and glory.



Experience a fresh twist on the classic card combat game genre. Engage in strategic battles where you must carefully plan how to utilize your arsenal to defeat your enemies. Whether it's wielding ordinary rocks found on the ground or unleashing the power of your reliable plasma rifle, every choice you make in combat will shape the outcome of the battle. Prepare yourself for a thrilling and innovative gameplay experience as you explore unconventional tactics and challenge your foes in unique ways.



Delve into the depths of the Calamity and uncover its origins. Discover the enigmatic "First folks" hidden within its depths. Navigate your way towards leadership and unravel the secrets of the empire and beyond. Embark on a journey to unearth the truth that lies within the heart of this mysterious world.

short_description: Immerse yourself in a narrative RPG / Trading card game and explore the dynamic world of Becoming Captain, a science-fiction universe where piracy has been almost extinguished, except aboard the Calamity... Will you become its captain or die trying?
